faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our sports live API service

0.question: What is Sports Live API?
0.answer: Sports Live API is a professional real-time sports data interface service that provides live match streaming, event data, team information and other features to help developers quickly build sports applications.

1.question: How to get started with the API?
1.answer: First register an account to get an API key, then check our development documentation and integrate according to the sample code. We provide SDK support for multiple programming languages.

2.question: Which sports are supported?
2.answer: We support mainstream sports such as football, basketball, tennis, baseball, ice hockey, covering major leagues and events worldwide.

3.question: Are there usage limits for the API?
3.answer: Different packages have different call frequency limits. The free version allows 100 requests per minute, while paid versions provide higher call quotas and priority support.

4.question: How to get technical support?
4.answer: We provide 24/7 technical support. You can get help through email, online customer service or technical forums. Paid users enjoy priority technical support services.

5.question: How often is data updated?
5.answer: Our data is updated in real-time, with multiple updates per second during live matches to ensure you get the latest match status and statistics.

6.question: Do you support historical data queries?
6.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive historical data query functionality, including past season match results, player statistics, team performance and other data.

7.question: How is API stability guaranteed?
7.answer: We use distributed architecture and multiple backup mechanisms to ensure 99.9% service availability. We also provide load balancing and failover functionality.

8.question: How do you handle high concurrent requests?
8.answer: Our system supports high concurrent access, using CDN acceleration and intelligent caching technology to ensure stable and fast service even during peak periods.

9.question: Do you offer a free trial?
9.answer: Yes, we provide a free trial package that includes basic features and limited API calls, allowing you to fully experience our service.

10.question: How to upgrade or change plans?
10.answer: You can upgrade or change plans anytime in the control panel. Changes take effect immediately and fees are calculated proportionally.

cta.title: Have other questions?
cta.description: If you haven't found the answer you're looking for, please feel free to contact our technical support team
cta.workingHours: Working hours: Monday to Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SportLiveAPI is a company focused on sports streaming technology services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

items.0: Contact information (name, email address, phone number)
items.1: Business information (company name, industry, business needs)

items.0: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
items.1: Usage data (page views, access time, feature usage)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.description: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

purposes.0: Provide and maintain our technical services
purposes.1: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
purposes.2: Improve our services and develop new features
purposes.4: Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights
purposes.5: Conduct data analysis to optimize service performance

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

conditions.1: To comply with legal requirements or court orders
conditions.2: To protect our rights, property, or safety
conditions.3: With trusted service providers who assist in our operations (under strict confidentiality agreements)

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption, access controls, regular security assessments, and staff training on data protection.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

rights.0: Access: Request access to your personal information we hold
rights.1: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
rights.2: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
rights.3: Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service provider
rights.4: Objection: Object to certain processing of your information
rights.5: Restriction: Request restriction of processing in certain circumstances

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When information is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it promptly.

dataTransfer.title: International Data Transfers
dataTransfer.description: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards to protect your information.

policyUpdates.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdates.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:
